nodes.text: Battle of Yavin was the fourth expansion card pack made for the Star Wars Trading Card Game produced by Wizards of the Coast, based on Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope—in particular, the elements of the Battle of Yavin. The expansion symbol is that of the first Death Star.
The expansion was released in March 31, 2003 and contains 105 cards. It was sold in boosters containing 11 (7 common, 3 uncommon, 1 rare) cards.
